shortInformation: The world's most unique voice, Dimash Qudaibergen, will meet his fans at Beşiktaş Stadium on May 24 with his magnificent and fascinating voice...Dimash, who will come to Istanbul for the first time under the main sponsorship of Rams Global, has a very rare voice range of 6 octaves, 4 notes and 1 semitone.Don't miss this unique performance of Dimash Qudaibergen, who will perform in seven languages: English, French, Spanish, Kazakh, Russian and Chinese!.Don't miss this magnificent concert held in cooperation with Yıldızlar Organization, Gain Medya and BWO Entertainment!.
title: Dimash Qudaibergen Concert

shortInformation: Enjoy a night of live music with top artists in the industry.
title: %100 Akustik: Ayna

shortInformation: Levent Yüksel, who started his soloist career at the top with the album Med Cezir, which touched all of our lives in 1993, is here with a symphonic feast for his 30th anniversary! He will bring you his most popular songs, carefully selected from all his albums, accompanied by a symphonic orchestra, at his 30th anniversary special concert.
title: 30th year Senfonic Concert of Levent Yüksel

shortInformation: Events Across Turkey is preparing to host its stars again in the 10th Season of its main project ISTANBUL NIGHT FLIGHT. - It hosts GÖKHAN TÜRKMEN, one of the most important artists of our country, for the first time with the An Epic Symphony project, accompanied by Night Flight Symphony Orchestra & Choir under the direction of Özgür Sevinç.
title: An Epic Symphony: Gökhan Türkmen

shortInformation: Events Across Turkey is preparing to host world stars again in the 10th Season of its main project ISTANBUL NIGHT FLIGHT. It hosts SİBEL CAN, one of the most important artists of our country, for the first time with the An Epic Symphony project, accompanied by Night Flight Symphony Orchestra & Choir under the direction of TULUĞ TIRPAN.
title: An Epic Symphony: Sibel Can

shortInformation: Gülşen, the hit queen of Turkish Pop Music, continues to appear before her fans who have been missing her for a long time. Concert tickets for Gülşen, who enchanted her audience with both her voice and stage performance, are on sale!
title: The Concert of Gulsen
